subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jonas Gray rushed for 199 yards and a franchise-record four touchdowns in his fourth N.F.L. game, leading the New England Patriots to a 42-20 victory over the host Indianapolis Colts on Sunday night.
snippet: Jonas Gray rushed for 199 yards and a franchise-record four touchdowns in his fourth N.F.L. game, leading the New England Patriots to a 42-20 victory over the host Indianapolis Colts on Sunday night.
